On Vega, price takers pay a fee on every: On Vega, price takers pay a fee on every trade - 100% of which is distributed between validators and token holders, market makers and liquidity providers. The are no gas fees on Vega.
Access liquidity provision fees on Vega,: Access liquidity provision fees on Vega, commit (and continue to support) a set bond amount to help keep a market liquid. The total liquidity needed on a market is determined by the protocol, and you specify the fee % you would like to receive. Active liquidity providers (starting with the cheapest first) then receive liquidity provider fees.
